title: The Intersection of Art and Technology with Mark Sabb
description: What's the future of art and museums? How will NFTs revolutionize the way we create, buy and sell art? Joshua and I will tackle these questions and more with Mark Sabb on this week's episode of How You Create.
dc:creator: How You Create
itunes:summary: What's the future of art and museums? How will NFTs revolutionize the way we create, buy and sell art? Joshua and I will tackle these questions and more with Mark Sabb on this week's episode of How You Create.
